name: The Raven (st-chem-atelier, rcmvoice, billvolkgames, krzyzis, illegalileo, Knickknack PJ, Exuin, Heiden)
name_original: The Raven (st-chem-atelier, rcmvoice, billvolkgames, krzyzis, illegalileo, Knickknack PJ, Exuin, Heiden)
description:
After a stressful week, you, a dispassionate college student become attracted to a stranger met at a Halloween party, only for this encounter to become deadly. Will you survive the night?

The Raven is a +16 horror visual novel project for Spooktober VN Jam 2021. The game contains mature content, mild descriptions of gore, vermiphobia, blood and implicit sexual content. 

Player discretion is advised.


  • Pronoun and Gender Choice for the Main Character
  • Gender Customizable Romance Option
  • Original Soundtracks
  • Four Endings
  • Unlockable CGs

Many thanks to the team who help bring this project to life.
